channel.title: Changeing the ingame "Showing" price of an item in the shop
channel.description: The title pretty much says it all, I've changed the price of rocktails so when I buy it, it does buy for 20k but it still says 600 in the shop? [url=http://imgur.com/2okzKOy]http://imgur.com/2okzKOy[/url]
